showScoreExcerpt:
"Something of a snooze...Buffett's songs are mixed into this sugary tropical cocktail of a show, which is shaken - if not successfully stirred into decent Broadway shape by Ashley...Leisurely chill-and-swill rhythms...are not conducive to propelling a Broadway musical...Leading players make a congenial foursome...While their boy-girl doings are not especially diverting, the performersâ€™ upbeat presence goes a long way to make the production a passable waste of time."
